title: Check your answers
subtitle: Early conciliation and employee details

disagreeEarlyConciliation.key: Do you agree with the details given by the claimant about early conciliation with Acas?

disagreeEarlyConciliationWhy.key: Why do you disagree with the Acas conciliation details given? (optional)

areDatesOfEmploymentCorrect.key: Are the dates of employment given by the claimant correct?

employmentDatesFurtherInformation.key: Do you want to provide any further information about the claimant's employment dates? (optional)

isEmploymentContinuing.key: Is the claimant’s employment with the respondent continuing?

isClaimantJobTitleCorrect.key: Is the claimant’s job title correct?

whatIsClaimantJobTitle.key: What is or was the claimant’s correct job title? (optional)

areWorkHourCorrect.key: Are the claimant’s average weekly work hours correct?

whatAreWorkHour.key: What are the claimant’s correct average weekly work hours? (optional)

question: Have you completed this section?
hint: You can change your answers later.
